price: 27. Iš tiesų, jei Tu paliksi juos, jie paklaidins Tavo tarnus ir negimdys nieko kito, tik (kiekvieną) nuodėmingąjį ir (tvirtai) netikintįjį.
arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ يُضِلُّواْ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا يَلِدُوٓاْ إِلَّا فَاجِرٗا كَفَّارٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innaka in tadharhum yuḍillū ʿibādaka walā yalidū illā fājiran kaffāran
